hero.title: UX/UI Audit & Optimization

heuristic-analysis.title: Heuristic analysis
heuristic-analysis.description: Expert evaluation based on UX principles.

user-testing.title: User testing
user-testing.description: Observation and analysis of real behaviors.

complete-audit.question: What does a complete UX/UI audit include?
complete-audit.answer: A complete audit includes: heuristic analysis based on UX principles, user testing, analytics data analysis, accessibility evaluation, competitive benchmark, and detailed recommendations. We provide a comprehensive report with concrete solutions.

audit-process.question: How does the audit process work?
audit-process.answer: The process begins with a discovery phase to understand your objectives and KPIs. We then perform various analyses (heuristic, data, testing), synthesize results, and prepare a detailed report with prioritized recommendations.

deliverables.question: What deliverables are provided?
deliverables.answer: You receive a complete audit report including: executive summary, detailed analyses, data visualizations, identified issues with severity levels, prioritized recommendations, and suggested action plan.

measuring-impact.question: How do you measure the impact of recommendations?
measuring-impact.answer: We define specific KPIs for each recommendation and set up tracking of key metrics (conversion rate, user satisfaction, task completion time, etc.) to measure the impact of improvements.

post-audit-support.question: Do you offer post-audit support?
post-audit-support.answer: Yes, we offer support for implementing recommendations, including: action prioritization, implementation support, and results measurement. We can also conduct follow-up audits.
